 appTitle

Detailed Description

settings() class

The instance of this class generates the settings object required by several other objects. It inherits from dict primitive 

Just a container for most settings shared between several objects.
   Settings that are automatically defined:
   - basedir
   - current working directory (cwd) - initially usr/worked - but can be overriden
   by settings from the loaded model (project.xml)

   Settings that are loaded from XML files:
   - menu widget ??? - put the path to resources in the XML file menu.xml ???
   - upper toolbox widget ??? - same as for the menu widget ???
   - canvas widget
   - XML Editor
   - console
   - status bar???

Definition at line 25 of file settings.py.

00105         """Adds data to XML file paths.xml"""
00106         
00107         tree = ET.parse(self["XMLPath"])
00108         root = tree.getroot() 
00109 
00110         if (root.find(data).tag == data):
00111 
00112             if data == 'modules':
00113                 self["extraModulesPath"][element['name']] = element['path']
00114                 module = tree.SubElement(root.find(data), 'module')
00115                 name   = tree.SubElement(module, 'name')

00117                 path   = tree.SubElement(module, 'path')
00118                 path.text = element['path']
00119

00121                 self['cwd'] = element
00122                 lwd = root.find(data)
00123                 lwd.text = element
00124

00127                                           :
00128         """Removes data to XML file paths.xml"""
00129         
00130         tree = ET.parse(self["XMLPath"])
00131         root = tree.getroot() 
00132 
00133         if (root.find(data).tag == data) and (element in self["extraModulesPath"]):
00134             if data == 'modules':
00135                 del self["extraModulesPath"][element]
00136                 module = root.find('modules')
00137                 for i in module.findall('module'):   
00138                     if i[0].text == element:
00139                         module.remove(i)
00140             
00141             if data == "cwd": # resets to default /usr/worked
00142                 self['cwd'] = 'usr/worked'
00143                 lwd = root.find(data)
00144                 lwd.text = 'usr/worked'
00145                 
00146             tree.write(self["XMLPath"], encoding = "UTF-8")
